sentences.en: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.

sentences.en: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.cn: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.en: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.cn: 他是在伦敦长大的。

sentences.en: He hopped to and fro between London and Paris for the business.
sentences.cn: 为了这笔生意他曾不停地往返于伦敦和巴黎。
